channel.title: QuarterX 474 Project
channel.description: [size=36pt]I GOT PERMISSION TO USE THE NAME QuarterX™ since they are now [i]InnovationX[/i] and started over again.[/size] Base: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449797.msg3299725.html#msg3299725 Came already with these: Features. - Real SkillCape Emotes. - Fight Pits. - Fight Caves. - Pest Control. - Barrows 100%. - Duel Arena. - Special Attacks. - Working Obelisks. - Modern/Ancient/Lunar Books. - 474+ Emotes. - 474+ Interfaces. - Perfect combat system. - All skills are trainable I think. - Instant DDS Spec. - Multi Ice Barrage. I plan to [b]change[/b] a bunch of these, as it says "All skills are trainable I think" is a false statement, and I'm going to make all them work. I'm planning to make it a classic pk'ing/economy server with the original home of Lumbridge and add a tutorial island, and such. As I'm also adding the following: - Edited Combat System (It's not perfect, at all.) - More skills - There are [i]many[/i] client bugs. - Wilderness levels. - Jad arena with 21 waves. - Tutorial Island (exact like old RuneScape - I shall try my best!) - [i]EVENTUALLY[/i] running VPS hosted. - Construction, Hunting, and MAYBE Summoning cape emotes. (: More things I'll find that are missing, I'll add and list. I'm also looking for development team sorta kinda not really.. but if you'd like to help and [u][b]not[/b][/u] steal my work, please say so.

item.title: QuarterX 474 Project
item.dc:creator: @Xx_App1e_Xx Xx App1e Xx
item.description:
@Xx_App1e_Xx wrote:

[size=36pt]I GOT PERMISSION TO USE THE NAME QuarterX™ since they are now InnovationX and started over again.[/size]
Base: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449797.msg3299725.html#msg3299725
Came already with these:
Features.

  • Real SkillCape Emotes.
  • Fight Pits.
  • Fight Caves.
  • Pest Control.
  • Barrows 100%.
  • Duel Arena.
  • Special Attacks.
  • Working Obelisks.
  • Modern/Ancient/Lunar Books.
  • 474+ Emotes.
  • 474+ Interfaces.
  • Perfect combat system.
  • All skills are trainable I think.
  • Instant DDS Spec.
  • Multi Ice Barrage.
    I plan to change a bunch of these, as it says “All skills are trainable I think” is a false statement, and I’m going to make all them work. I’m planning to make it a classic pk’ing/economy server with the original home of Lumbridge and add a tutorial island, and such. As I’m also adding the following:
  • Edited Combat System (It’s not perfect, at all.)
  • More skills
  • There are many client bugs.
  • Wilderness levels.
  • Jad arena with 21 waves.
  • Tutorial Island (exact like old RuneScape - I shall try my best!)
  • EVENTUALLY running VPS hosted.
  • Construction, Hunting, and MAYBE Summoning cape emotes. (:
    More things I’ll find that are missing, I’ll add and list.
    I’m also looking for development team sorta kinda not really… but if you’d like to help and not steal my work, please say so.

Read full topic
